newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK industrial production index down 4.8 pct in Q3.
newsitem.headline: HK industrial production index down 4.8 pct in Q3.

text.p: Hong Kong's index of industrial production decreased by 4.8 percent in the third quarter of 1996, the Census and Statistics department said on Thursday.
Textiles output fell 8.4 percent and that of electrical and electronic products, machinery, professional equipment and optical goods fell 8.3 percent.
Consumer electrical and electronic products output decreased 13.5 percent. Chemicals, rubber, plastic and non-metallic mineral products output rose 0.2 percent.
Food, beverages and tobacco output increased 8.7 percent while paper products and printing output fell 2.5 percent.
Basic metals and fabricated metal products output decreased 5.8 percent and that of machinery, equipment, apparatus, parts and components slipped 4.2 percent.
Production of wearing apparel, except footwear, fell 8.4 percent.
